body_html: Sorry for the seriously long delay, will try to repro. It's also helpful if you use TF_XLA_FLAGS="--xla_dump_computations_to=/tmp/" as a prefix on your cmdline and post the protobuf binary that appears as a result along with the git revision (the XLA compilation can be replayed directly with https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/e210cb140a60a74d5e9ce3bf9ebedb21b4910f1c/tensorflow/compiler/xla/tools/replay_computation.cc ).

body: Sorry for the seriously long delay, will try to repro. It's also helpful if you use TF_XLA_FLAGS="--xla_dump_computations_to=/tmp/" as a prefix on your cmdline and post the protobuf binary that appears as a result along with the git revision (the XLA compilation can be replayed directly with https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/e210cb140a60a74d5e9ce3bf9ebedb21b4910f1c/tensorflow/compiler/xla/tools/replay_computation.cc ).
